title: 499. Room to Sew (No Matter What Size Space You Have)
description:
January is a popular time to organize your home, and we’ve spent the last four podcast episodes talking about storage, organization, and decluttering! (So, if you’ve missed any, you can still go back to listen in!) On today’s show, we’re tackling how to make room for sewing no matter the space you have – and also, how to capitalize on that space with storage and furniture ideas. We also talk to the insanely talented quilter, pattern designer, and author of a new book, Jessica Dayon!
For more resources from today's show, visit the show notes here: www.allpeoplequilt.com/magazines-more/quilting-podcast/episode-499-room-to-sew-no-matter-what-size-space-you-have
Email us at APQPodcast@meredith.com.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices

itunes:author: American Patchwork & Quilting
itunes:subtitle: Learn to capitalize on the sewing space you have. Plus, we interview Jessica Dayon!
